metadata.name: Bat-Master V.5
metadata.description: Soul of Bat moves faster and can open doors. All Bat abilities and upgrades are greatly enhanced. Hold Triangle to move bat at original speed.  Bat Familiar levels faster.
metadata.author: eldri7ch, SKR1MPZ, MT_Fun, MottZilla
